title.label: Awesome game but a couple of suggestions

content.label: First off I just want to say that this game is absolutely awesome a lot of good maps and helicopter as well. One exception I have is the fact that the graphics are 2d except the buildings and cars but I enjoy that you can destroy those things with helicopters like an apache or black shark and stuff like that, but the HID or HIP needs to have weapons at least a machine gun because it is my favorite helicopter from the game and in the real world and it would be great to have machine guns on the doors. I also have a suggestion to make helicopters like. He Osprey and Hind free because they are also helicopters that look good and would be awesome to have free my last suggestion is to add another map like Space where you can ride spacecraft into space from earth or at least more maps free like a forest map or a map like Chernobyl. Overall this game is great in my opinion and I would love to see these suggestions put in to the game thank you.

title.label: I love it but needs more addition.
